attributes.action: Force internet service providers, to provide effective security for their users.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment it seems so easy for people to gain access to peoples e-mail accounts and bank and credit card details, via isp's. The internet has been with us for almost 30 years and the problem of internet fraud and theft has been there right from the start. It is high time the isp's were forced to provide proper levels of internet security. We, their customers should have the right to some protection, but at the moment if we get any protection at all, the hackers find it so easy to by-pass it.
